attributes.action: Increase teacher motivation through training in order that student motivation is subsequestly increased.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Education, Education, Education. Millions of pounds go into the education budget each year whilst few of those in the education system itself truly appreciate their cost. Its down to motivation and appreciation. If a child is sent to the best schools the motivation to do well is their, this may contribute to the outcome rather than the quality of the school itself. Low achieving schools have staff with low motivation and pupils often from Britains poorest areas liable to suffer as a result.
